name: deglaze
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to add liquid to the cooking juices and small pieces of food in a pan in which something has been cooked, in order to make a sauce: Deglaze your pan with a little vinegar mixed with water. De-glaze the pan with a glass of white wine and cook until the sauce has thickened. Deglaze the fish with lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper.
